main.name: Ishan Minhas
main.description: God has not promised Skies always blue,  Flower-strewn pathways   All our life through;   God has not promised Sun without rain,  Joy without sorrow,  Peace without pain.”  ― A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, Wings of Fire
main.designation: Deep Learning and Machine Learning Enthusiast | React.js Web Developer
main.bio: I am a B.E. Electronics and  Computer Science major at Thapar University. I am a Deep Learning and Machine Learning enthusiast, who loves to experiment and explore new ideas. I love maths, statistics and data analysis . I also love to work on web development using React.js. I firmly believe that projects are the best way to transition from knowledge to excellency in any subject.
main.misc: I am fluent in English, Hindi and Punjabi. Übung macht den Meister!
main.contactmessage: Let's get in touch! Fill the form below to shoot me a message

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Class XII, CBSE: (PCM) 87.67%      Class X, CBSE: 9.8/10

work.company: Shortest Delivery Path Calculator on Map
work.title: Web Development
work.description: I Used TomTom Maps API, ReactJs, JavaScript, and Basic Data Structures such as Dijkstraʼs Algorithm and Bread First Search to calculate the shortest path and distance between two points using latitude and longitude location or by just tapping address of the delivery location on the map.

work.title: Web Development
work.description: Made a replica of the mobile game called Candy Crush using ReactJs and Data Structures for the Front‑End Development and used DataStax Astra Cassandra Databases for saving the scores of multiple users at a time for different levels. I used NodeJs for the Backend Linking of my game to store the results.

work.title: Web Development
work.description: My team and I made a BloodBank Management website to promote the donation of blood for the needy of our society. We used PHP, HTML, CSS3 + Bootstrap for developing Front and Backend and MySQL for storing data in the database. This project is created for Donors/Receivers and Hospitals/Clinics(Doctors), where a Hospital user can add blood samples to their blood bank, request for blood, check the status of their request, update their details, etc. The donor/receiver can also do the same.

work.company: The Effect of Fiscal Policy on Investment
work.title: Panel Data Regression
work.description: This project evaluates the impact of fiscal policy components on private and public investment using data for a panel of fifteen emerging economies over the period 2009-2017. The within estimator and the two step System - GMM estimators have been employed for this data analysis in order to make useful inferences.

work.title: Chatbots
